title: Democrats and Republicans remain at odds over natural immunity for COVID
author: KAYLA GASKINS; The National Desk
description: The debate over vaccines and natural immunity is still hot as ever on Capitol Hill.
cleaned_text: Democrats and Republicans remain at odds over natural immunity for COVID by KAYLA GASKINS | The National Desk FILE - In this April 1, 2021, file photo Gov. Greg Gianforte receives a shot of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine from pharmacist Drew Garton at a Walgreen's pharmacy, in Helena, Mont. (Thom Bridge/Independent Record via AP, File)
